analysis.heading: Lot size
analysis.content: The characteristics of a lot determine its development potential and chief among these characteristics is the area of the lot. As Palo Alto developed and grew through annexation, each subdivision evolved with unique characteristics e.g., the size of the lots within the subdivision. Five R-1 zones reflect and preserve traditional lotting patterns with criteria for minimum and maximum lot sizes.
tables: Min. & max. lot sizes by zone table showing requirements for R-1 through R-1(20000) zones
Substandard lot sizes by zone table showing Typical lot and Flag lot sizes for R-1 through R-1(20000) zones
